blocks.text: Enter age to view the reference liver length.
Reference bands from Radiology World pediatric liver size tool (Konus et al., AJR 1998) adjusted for height when available.
Uses height-based bracket when provided; otherwise the closest age band.
Lengths in centimeters; height ranges in centimeters. Derived from Radiology World pediatric liver calculator (Konus et al., AJR 1998) and Radiology Assistant normal values.
